attributes.action: Introduce a higher level of student funding for University students.
attributes.additional_details: The minimum amount of student finance available for students living away from home is £4054 for the academic year. The cheapest room available at the University of Derby on a 42-week contract is £4,621.68 per week leaving a deficit of £567.68 before any additional living costs such as food and travel have been taken into consideration. The current system is not sustainable, for neither taxpayers or students.
attributes.background: I’m campaigning on behalf of all University students to increase the rate of student finance to one which can support students to live independently without being reliant on part-time employment or credit.
